name: StringBuilder Visualizer
short_description:
StringBuilder Visualizer is a tool for .Net developers who use Microsoft Visual Studio. It was developed to be able to view the contents of a StringBuilder object while debugging (a feature which was removed since VS 2008).

How to use:
Copy the files StringBuilderVisualizer.dll and Visualizer.exe to your C:\Users\<username>\Documents\Visual Studio 2012\Visualizers folder. (Or equivalent). Source code for all files is included.

Or recompile the project (which will copy those two files to that location using the post-compile event options under properties).

Key Features:
-The dialog is non-modal, so you can edit code without having to close the dialog.
-The dialog stays open between recompiling, which is convenient for comparing output changes.

Currently types String and StringBuilder are supported.
summary: Visualize a String or StringBuilder when in debug mode.
